title: Peaceful Phuket Paradise Steps from Surin Beach with Two Pools
description: Dreamy tropical days are best spent at Outrigger Surin Beach Resort, a beach-facing haven nestled on the pristine shores of Phuket's Surin Beach. This idyllic retreat is a stone's throw away from Phuket's vibrant nightlife, high-end shopping and world-class dining venues. Spend your days exploring the Andaman Sea's crystal-clear waters, savouring delicious cuisine at Nalu Bar & Grill or simply unwinding at the resortâ€™s shimmering pools.
offer_address: 121/1 Moo 3, Srisunthorn Road Cheng Talay, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand
